lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did God say would happen  if they ate from the Tree of  the Knowledge of Good and Evil?
answers: They would die
They would live forever and never die
They would become angels
Nothing bad would happen

questions.text: Who was the serpent who came to Eve?
answers: The devil
Just an ordinary clever snake
An angel testing her
Adam in disguise

questions.text: What did the serpent say to Eve?
answers: You won’t die; you’ll know  good and evil like God
God will be happier with you if you eat it
The fruit will make the garden grow faster
If you eat it, all the animals will obey you

questions.text: After talking with the  serpent, what did Eve do?
answers: She ate the fruit and gave some to her husband
She threw the fruit away and ran to God
She told Adam but didn’t eat it
She hid the fruit so no one could find it

questions.text: What did Adam and Eve realize after  eating the fruit, and what did they do?
answers: They realized they were  naked, made clothes, and hid
They realized they were  hungry and picked more fruit
They realized they were  strong and ran around the garden
They realized they were  bored and left the garden

questions.text: What curses did God give to the serpent?
answers: To crawl on his belly and one  of Eve’s sons would crush him
To lose his voice and never speak again
To live in the sea instead of on land
To sleep for a thousand years

questions.text: What curses did God give to the woman?
answers: Great pain in childbirth  and struggles with her husband
She would never be able to speak again
She would have to live outside the garden alone
She would never be able to see her children

questions.text: What curses did God give to the man?
answers: Hard and frustrating work and  that he would return to dust (die)
He could never eat fruit again
He had to leave Eve and live by himself
He had to name all the animals again

questions.text: After giving them curses, what  did God do to the man and woman?
answers: He clothed them with animal skins  and drove them out of the garden
He told them to hide and never come back
He left them in the garden  but took away the animals
He made them build a city far away

questions.text: Who was the mysterious son  of Eve who came to crush the  serpent, and how did he do it?
answers: Jesus, who defeated sin and  Satan by dying on the cross  and rising from the dead
Moses, who defeated the serpent  by lifting up a staff
David, who defeated the serpent  with a sling and a stone
Noah, who defeated the serpent  by surviving the flood
